text: (yah khairaat) khaas un haajatamandon ke lie hai jo khuda kee raah mein ghir gaye ho (aur) rooe zameen par (jaana chaahen to) chal nahin sakate naavaaqif unako savaal na karane kee vajah se ameer samajhate hain (lekin) too (ai mukhaatib agar unako dekhe) to unakee soorat se taad jaaye (ki ye mohataaj hain agarache) logon se chimat ke savaal nahin karate aur jo kuchh bhee tum nek kaam mein kharch karate ho khuda usako zaroor jaanata hai
